title: Pset_SpaceOccupancyRequirements
description: Properties concerning work activities occurring or expected to occur within one or a set of similar spatial structure elements.

OccupancyType.title: OccupancyType
OccupancyType.description: Occupancy type for this object. It is defined according to the presiding national building code.

OccupancyNumber.title: OccupancyNumber
OccupancyNumber.description: Number of people required for the activity assigned to this space.

OccupancyNumberPeak.title: OccupancyNumberPeak
OccupancyNumberPeak.description: Maximal number of people required for the activity assigned to this space in peak time.

OccupancyTimePerDay.title: OccupancyTimePerDay
OccupancyTimePerDay.description: The amount of time during the day that the activity is required within this space.

AreaPerOccupant.title: AreaPerOccupant
AreaPerOccupant.description: Design occupancy loading for this type of usage assigned to this space.

MinimumHeadroom.title: MinimumHeadroom
MinimumHeadroom.description: Headroom required for the activity assigned to this space.

IsOutlookDesirable.title: IsOutlookDesirable
IsOutlookDesirable.description: An indication of whether the outlook is desirable (set TRUE) or not (set FALSE)
